Question.Subject: Can you pay Livejournal to unblock your account?
Question.Content: Livejournal suspended my account for unclear reasons, and I they haven't got back to me for the past two weeks despite several emails. I was wondering if it would be easier to just pay LJ to release my account if that was possible. I have a ton of stuff on there going back to 2004 that I'd like to get back.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Not possible and they don't really care about your account. As evidenced by their lack of response.

Answer.Content: Not possible and they don't really care about your account. As evidenced by their lack of response.
